backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a background-color update to specific frontend CSS files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files including styles, components, and deployment docs.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining steps to rebuild and deploy the site without code changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH color tokens and enforcing pure white backgrounds on html, body, and #root.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point with meta tags and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling all major site sections between header and footer.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section presenting company overview and feature cards describing strengths.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section displaying phone, address, hours, and a call-to-action panel.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders the homepage hero with background image, marketing text, call-to-action buttons, and location info, including smooth scroll to contact.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Displays a four-step process overview and a capabilities list using icons and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/Product: Shows a grid of varagu husk product types with descriptions, applications, and a contact button.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component showing company info, navigation shortcuts, contact details, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with scroll behavior, navigation links, logo, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities to manage Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based theme tokens, global styles, and typography for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/contact.ts: Exports the display and dialable contact phone number constants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content paths, theme extensions for colors, spacing, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, existing feature for replacing orange background with white, and a pending new feature request.
